## Description

PR guidelines.

## Checklist

- [ ] Followed [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) guide
- [ ] Code format guidelines are followed (`make format`)
- [ ] Added necessary tests for change if needed
- [ ] All existing tests pass (`make test` and `make test-python`)
- [ ] Docs have been updated if needed
